languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, старейшины корабельных кланов молят о помощи — за последние несколько недель бесследно исчезло более сотни членов экипажа из разных домов! Я проверила судовые отчеты — никто из пропавших в жизни не покидал корабль — все они работали глубоко в чреве судна".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, старейшины корабельных кланов молят о помощи — за последние несколько недель бесследно исчезло более сотни членов экипажа из разных домов! Я проверила судовые отчеты — никто из пропавших в жизни не покидал корабль — все они работали глубоко в чреве судна".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, the elders of the ship's clans are pleading for help — over a hundred members of the crew from various families have disappeared without a trace in the past few weeks! I've checked the crew's records — none of the missing has ever set foot off the ship before, and they all worked deep in the belly of the vessel."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, старейшины корабельных кланов молят о помощи — за последние несколько недель бесследно исчезло более сотни членов экипажа из разных домов! Я проверила судовые отчеты — никто из пропавших в жизни не покидал корабль — все они работали глубоко в чреве судна".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the elders of the ship's clans are pleading for help — over a hundred members of the crew from various families have disappeared without a trace in the past few weeks! I've checked the crew's records — none of the missing never left the ship and they all worked deep in the belly of the voidship."

"Lord Captain, the elders of the ship's clans are pleading for help — over a hundred members of the crew from various families have disappeared without a trace in the past few weeks! I've checked the crew's records — none of the missing never left the ship and they all worked deep in the belly of the voidship."

"Lord Captain, the elders of the ship's clans are pleading for help — over a hundred members of the crew from various families have disappeared without a trace in the past few weeks! I've checked the crew's records — none of the missing has ever set foot off the ship before, and they all worked deep in the belly of the vessel."

"Lord Captain, the elders of the ship's clans are pleading for help — over a hundred members of the crew from various families have disappeared without a trace in the past few weeks! I've checked the crew's records — none of the missing has ever set foot off the ship before, and they all worked deep in the belly of the vessel."

"Lord Captain, the elders of the ship's clans are pleading for help — over a hundred members of the crew from various families have disappeared without a trace in the past few weeks! I've checked the crew's records — none of the missing has ever set foot off the ship before, and they all worked deep in the belly of the vessel."

languages.text: “舰长大人，船上各个氏族的长老都在恳求帮助。在过去的几周里，来自不同氏族的一百多名船员消失得无影无踪！我检查过那些失踪船员的所有记录，他们根本没有离开过这艘船。他们在失踪之前，都在这艘船的深处工作。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the elders of the ship's clans are pleading for help — over a hundred members of the crew from various families have disappeared without a trace in the past few weeks! I've checked the crew's records — none of the missing has ever set foot off the ship before, and they all worked deep in the belly of the vessel."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，船上各个氏族的长老都在恳求帮助。在过去的几周里，来自不同氏族的一百多名船员消失得无影无踪！我检查过那些失踪船员的所有记录，他们根本没有离开过这艘船。他们在失踪之前，都在这艘船的深处工作。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, los ancianos de los clanes de la nave suplican ayuda. ¡Más de cien tripulantes de las diversas familias han desaparecido en las últimas semanas! He comprobado los registros de la nave: ninguno de ellos ha salido de la nave y todos trabajaban en lo más profundo».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the elders of the ship's clans are pleading for help — over a hundred members of the crew from various families have disappeared without a trace in the past few weeks! I've checked the crew's records — none of the missing has ever set foot off the ship before, and they all worked deep in the belly of the vessel."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, los ancianos de los clanes de la nave suplican ayuda. ¡Más de cien tripulantes de las diversas familias han desaparecido en las últimas semanas! He comprobado los registros de la nave: ninguno de ellos ha salido de la nave y todos trabajaban en lo más profundo».

languages.text: "Herr Kapitän, die Ältesten der Clans des Schiffes bitten um Hilfe — über hundert Mitglieder der Besatzung aus verschiedenen Familien sind in den letzten Wochen spurlos verschwunden! Ich habe die Aufzeichnungen der Besatzung überprüft — keiner der Vermissten hat jemals einen Fuß auf das Schiff gesetzt, und sie haben alle tief im Bauch des Schiffes gearbeitet."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the elders of the ship's clans are pleading for help — over a hundred members of the crew from various families have disappeared without a trace in the past few weeks! I've checked the crew's records — none of the missing has ever set foot off the ship before, and they all worked deep in the belly of the vessel."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the elders of the ship's clans are pleading for help — over a hundred members of the crew from various families have disappeared without a trace in the past few weeks! I've checked the crew's records — none of the missing has ever set foot off the ship before, and they all worked deep in the belly of the vessel."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les doyens de différents clans du vaisseau demandent de l'aide. Plus d'une centaine de membres d'équipage issus de leurs rangs ont disparu sans laisser de trace au cours des dernières semaines ! J'ai consulté les registres : aucun d'eux n'a jamais mis les pieds hors du vaisseau et tous travaillaient dans ses entrailles. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the elders of the ship's clans are pleading for help — over a hundred members of the crew from various families have disappeared without a trace in the past few weeks! I've checked the crew's records — none of the missing has ever set foot off the ship before, and they all worked deep in the belly of the vessel."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les doyens de différents clans du vaisseau demandent de l'aide. Plus d'une centaine de membres d'équipage issus de leurs rangs ont disparu sans laisser de trace au cours des dernières semaines ! J'ai consulté les registres : aucun d'eux n'a jamais mis les pieds hors du vaisseau et tous travaillaient dans ses entrailles. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、船の一族の老人達が助けを求めています。別々の家庭に属する百人以上のクルーがここ数週間で忽然と姿を消しています！クルーの記録を確認しましたが…行方不明者は、みな船を降りたことがなく、船の深部で働いていたとのことです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the elders of the ship's clans are pleading for help — over a hundred members of the crew from various families have disappeared without a trace in the past few weeks! I've checked the crew's records — none of the missing has ever set foot off the ship before, and they all worked deep in the belly of the vessel."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、船の一族の老人達が助けを求めています。別々の家庭に属する百人以上のクルーがここ数週間で忽然と姿を消しています！クルーの記録を確認しましたが…行方不明者は、みな船を降りたことがなく、船の深部で働いていたとのことです」
